name: Lumiterra
description:
Lumiterra is a multiplayer, open-world survival crafting game where you can ⚔️battle, 👩‍🌾farm with your friends🧑‍🤝‍🧑 or mysterious collected creatures in a vast world🗺️!

🌈 Game Features

🌟 Multiplayer: Play alone or with your friends.

🌟 Battle: Fight monsters with various weapons and skills in a vast world.

🌟 Farming: Grow crops, catch and feed monsters on your farm.

🌟 Collecting: Collect grass, wood, and rock in different areas of the world.

🌟 Crafting: Use different materials from battle, farming, or collecting to craft weapons, equipment, totem, potion, etc.

Don't hesitate to dive into the world of Lumiterra and share your experiences with us! Happy gaming!
